{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Audr's Letter
| icon           = poe2 plain_letter icon.png
| description    = My dear Wifruth,

I do not believe this letter shall ever make its way to you, but if you are reading it now, I must suppose it has, and my heart is glad for it.

No doubt you are furious with me for leaving as I did, in the very dead of night. I knew you would not accept what it is I intend to do, and I could not bear to see the hurt in your eyes when I walked out the door.

I have met a scholar whose brilliance is unsurpassed by any I have known. He is Awakened, Wifruth. All the many nested memories of his past lives are like an open book before him. Imagine!

He has said he will Awaken me, too - I need only renounce my present life, pledge myself to him, and meet him at the appointed time.

I am sorry, Wifruth. I do not ask that you forgive me, only that you understand - my previous lives call to me, and I am helpless to answer them.

May we find each other in another, better life.

- Audr
